description: NASA’s PUNCH mission has reached full operational status, enabling continuous monitoring of the Sun and solar wind from multiple vantage points around Earth. This collaborative effort complements other major solar missions and promises valuable insights into the Sun–Earth connection. Early public release of PUNCH’s science data marks an exciting opportunity for researchers and space enthusiasts worldwide.
title: NASA’s PUNCH Mission Completes Final Orbit Manoeuvres, Opens Early Sun Data to the Public

description: SpaceX successfully launched 24 new Starlink satellites on Aug. 14, lifting off at 1:05 a.m. EDT from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California aboard a Falcon 9 rocket. The first-stage booster, B1093, completed its fifth flight and landed smoothly on the drone ship Of Course I Still Love You in the Pacific Ocean. This mission marked SpaceX’s 98th Falcon 9 flight of 2025, raising the active Starlink constellation to over 8,100 satellites. Starlink currently delivers broadband service to about 130 countries and territories, targeting near-global coverage with a planned 12,000-satellite network. SpaceX’s next mission, Starlink 17-5, is set for Aug. 15, aiming to send another 24 satellites into orbit to further expand the network.
title: SpaceX Launches 24 More Starlink Satellites, Expands Global Internet Network

description: In a groundbreaking discovery, astronomers observed SN 2023zkd, a supernova that may have been triggered by close interaction with a black hole. Featuring unusual brightness peaks and extended pre-explosion activity, the event offers new insights into star black hole dynamics. Real-time AI detection played a key role, and upcoming surveys promise to uncover more of these rare stellar phenomena.
title: Astronomers Observe Rare Supernova–Black Hole Interaction in Early Stages

description: A rare NASA satellite image shows 10 sharply defined “dark voids” above Heard Island, a volcanic peak in the southern Indian Ocean. Formed by von Kármán vortices bent nearly 90 degrees by fierce westerly winds, the striking gaps pierce thick cloud cover, offering a vivid glimpse of nature’s intricate atmospheric patterns from space.
title: 10 Strange 'Dark Voids' Appear Over Remote Island Near Antarctica in Rare Satellite View

description: Akkenam, an action thriller, covers the bond by fate, sharing a sense of justice, and they form an unexpected alliance to take down a looming threat that endangers countless lives. As the journey unfolds, both these men confront their past and push the limits to stop a force more dangerous than imagined. What starts as an encounter leads to redemption and survival.
title: Akkenam Now Available on AhaTamil: Know Everything About This Action-Packed Tamil Thriller

description: Lilo & Stitch is a Disney Sci-Fi movie that follows a girl called Lilo, who adopts a dog, unaware that he is an Alien. Soon, she names him Stitch and then watch how beautifully the duo connect. However, things take a tense turn when the creator of the Alien is on a hunt for him. Will he find him?
title: Lilo & Stitch OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Paranthu Po is a Ram directorial musical comedy. The movie covers the story of a stubborn school boy and his middle-class father, as they set out on a road trip across Tamil Nadu and Kerala. The film covers the physical and emotional terrain, the role of parenting, and the bond between the son and father, while emphasizing the art and importance of slowing down.
title: Paranthu Po Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know
